title: SCIURus: Shared Circuits for Interpretable Uncertainty Representations in Language Models
details: C Teplica, Y Liu, A Cohan, TGJ Rudner - Neurips Safe Generative AI Workshop 2024
abstract: We investigate the mechanistic sources of uncertainty in large language models (LLMs), an area with important implications for their reliability and trustworthiness. To do so, we conduct a series of experiments designed to identify whether the factuality …
